companyProfile.companyDescription: State Bank of India is an India-based banking and financial services provider. The Company is engaged in providing a wide range of products and services to individuals, commercial enterprises, corporates, public bodies and institutional customers. The Company has a digital platform, YONO 2.0, which is designed to reduce customer acquisition costs by a factor of ten compared to traditional banking methods. Its segments include Treasury, Corporate/Wholesale Banking, Retail Banking, Insurance Business and Other Banking Business. The Treasury segment includes investment portfolios and trading in foreign exchange contracts and derivative contracts. The Corporate/Wholesale Banking segment comprises the lending activities of the corporate accounts group, the commercial client’s group and the stressed assets resolution group. The Retail Banking Segment is engaged in personal banking activities including lending activities to corporate customers having banking relations with its branches.

title.Value: Managing Director - International Banking, Global Markets & Technology, Executive Director

shareholding.categoryName: Shareholding of Promoter and Promoter Group

boardMeetings.remarks: Inter alia, to consider and approve 1. Raising funds during FY26 by way of issuance of Basel III compliant capital bonds.
Inter-alia, to consider 1. Examine the status & decide on long term Fund Raising in single/multiple tranches of up to US$ 3 Billion under Reg-S/144A, through a public offer and/or private placement.
Inter alia, to seek approval for raising of Long-Term Bonds through a public issue or private placement of suitable tenor in compliance with SEBI guidelines, during the financial year 2024-25.
Inter alia, to consider and approve Prior intimation for meeting of the Executive Committee of the Central Board to seek approval for raising of Infrastructure Bonds.
Inter alia, To seek approval for raising of Infrastructure Bonds up to an amount of Rs. 10,000 crores (including a green shoe option of Rs. 5,000 crores) through a public issue or private placement.

Inter alia, to consider and approve To seek approval for raising of Additional Tier 1 (AT 1) Capital by way of issuance of Basel III compliant debt instrument in USD and / or INR through a Public offe

recentNews.headline: Tight liquidity, deposit struggle pushes SBI to raise ₹6,000 cr via CDs at 6%
recentNews.summary: SBI’s rare move to raise ₹6,000 crore via certificates of deposit underscores tight liquidity and deposit stress, even as credit demand remains strong across the banking system.

recentNews.headline: Wall Street bankers Citi, JP Morgan opt out of $1.4 billion SBI Funds IPO— Read why
recentNews.summary: Low fees reflect a pattern seen in past government-linked deals. When State Bank raised 250 billion rupees ($2.8 billion) through a share sale in July, it paid six bankers just one rupee each, according to local media.

recentNews.headline: SBI, DMart to Bajaj Finance: Axis Securities lists 15 stocks to buy, pegs Nifty 50 target at 28,100 for 2026
recentNews.summary: Among the top stocks to buy, Axis Securities recommended HDFC Bank, Bajaj Finance, Bharti Airtel, Avenue Supermarts, State Bank of India, Max Healthcare, Kirloskar Brothers, Kalpataru Projects, APL Apollo Tubes, Mahanagar Gas among others.

recentNews.headline: Received SBI rewards message, beware! Govt warns users, says bank never sends links or APK files over SMS or WhatsApp
recentNews.summary: PIB-fact check has warned SBI customers about a fraudulent rewards message along with the APK file and advised vigilance against scams.

recentNews.headline: Bank holiday today: Are banks open or closed on 26th December due to Christmas celebrations? Check RBI calendar
recentNews.summary: Bank holiday today, 26 December: The bank holiday today has been decided by the Reserve Bank of India through its bank holiday calendar.

recentNews.headline: SBI plans to add 6,500 staff for YONO 2.0 as it targets 200 million digital users
recentNews.summary: State Bank of India has launched YONO 2.0, a completely rewritten version of its digital banking platform, to accelerate customer migration to digital channels.

recentNews.headline: SBI revises term deposit rates, reduces lending rates — check details
recentNews.summary: The State Bank of India has revised interest rates for term deposits and reduced MCLR and EBLR rates following a repo rate cut by the RBI. Interest rates for senior citizens and the general public on various tenures have been revised, effective from December 15, 2025.

recentNews.headline: Stocks to watch: Tata Steel, Adani Enterprises, SBI, Cipla among 10 shares in focus today
recentNews.summary: Stocks to watch: Tata Steel, Adani Enterprises, SBI, Cipla are some of the stocks that will remain in focus on Thursday, 11 December 2025.

recentNews.headline: Market capitalisation of 5 of top-10 most valued firms surges ₹72,285 crore; TCS, Infosys biggest gainers
recentNews.summary: Mcap of five of top-10 most-valued firms surges ₹72,285 cr; TCS, Infosys biggest winners

recentNews.headline: Buy or sell: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday - 8 December 2025
recentNews.summary: Ganesh Dongre of Anand Rathi recommends three stocks to buy on Monday -State Bank of India, Infosys, and Union Bank of India.
